item.title: Books That Discuss Environmental Issues and Conservation
item.description: If you’re looking to learn more about environmental issues and conservation, then you’re in luck! Here are five books that explore these important topics: Silent Spring by Rachel Carson, a groundbreaking book that helped to launch the modern environmental movement. In this classic work, Carson exposes the harmful effects of pesticides on the environment and argues for greater regulation of these substances. The Sixth Extinction: An Unnatural History by Elizabeth Kolbert, a sobering look at the ongoing mass extinction of species caused by human activities.
